> This wiki distills the attached presentation into a structured, replicable model for Rural Social Industrial Complexes (RSIC) in Sudan.

### Executive Summary — المختصر المفيد
- Industry is the lever for broad-based prosperity, sovereignty over resources, and durable peace.
- Vision → Industrial Strategy → Transformation Programs, executed by a neutral, national, expert body.
- The RSIC model centers **people**, **ethics**, and **distributed ownership** while pursuing speed and quality.

> Source: RSIC presentation, July 2024. (انظر الشرائح ذات العناوين: المختصر المفيد، لماذا الصناعة؟)
